name: Character Name Creator
description:
What is this asset?

This asset is a character name creation system with the following features:

  • Setup to enable the player to change character names at any point in your game (at the very beginning or when adding party members for example - just create the object and pass it an id)
  • Player can switch between upper / lower case easily
  • Easy to add more letters/characters or change the layout of the letters - as long as you conform to a grid (add blank spaces to achieve this - as seen in the video)
  • Allows for keyboard/controller input
  • Player can hold down buttons to move the cursor faster or press a button independently just like your favourite RPG's
